code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{addAccount}from'./api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function AddAccount(){const[form,setForm]=useState({name:'',initialBalance:''});const handleChange=e=>{setForm({...form,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();addAccount(form).then(()=>{alert('Account added successfully');setForm({name:'',initialBalance:''});});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Add Account"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"name",value:form.name,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"Name",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",name:"initialBalance",value:form.initialBalance,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"Initial Balance",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add Account"})]})]});}export default AddAccount;
